title: Dominik Fótyik
text:
Dominik Fótyik (born 16 September 1990) is a <a href="Slovakia">Slovak</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> defender of <a href="Hungarians%20in%20Slovakia">Hungarian ethnicity</a> who currently plays for Hungarian side <a href="Kazincbarcikai%20SC">Kazincbarcikai SC</a>.
Career.
He began his career as centre back or left back, later played as striker and currently plays again as central defender.
MFK Zemplín Michalovce.
In July 2011, he joined Slovak club <a href="MFK%20Zempl%C3%ADn%20Michalovce">MFK Zemplín Michalovce</a> on a one-year loan from <a href="M%C5%A0K%20%C5%BDilina">MŠK Žilina</a>. He made his debut for <a href="MFK%20Zempl%C3%ADn%20Michalovce">MFK Zemplín Michalovce</a> against <a href="FK%20LAFC%20Lu%C4%8Denec">FK LAFC Lučenec</a> on 23 July 2011.
Club statistics.
"Updated to games played as of 9 December 2017."
